headline: Lam Research Corporation (LRCX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Lam Research Corporation (LRCX) on Substack by The Antifragile Investor. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on LRCX. Lam Research Corporation (LRCX)’s share was trading at $82.79 as of 21st May. LRCX’s trailing and forward P/E were 23.06 and 19.01 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Lam Research […]

headline: Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights: CyberArk, Lam Research and monday.com
summary: CyberArk, Lam Research and monday.com are defying tech headwinds with strong growth, analyst upgrades and double-digit upside potential.
